title: International Astronomical Union - Wikipedia
snippet: Subsequent history is recorded in the form of reminiscences of past IAU Presidents and General Secretaries. Twelve of the fourteen past General Secretaries in the period 1964–2006 contributed their recollections of the Union's history in IAU Information Bulletin No.

title: Governance Structure - IAU
snippet: 1975-1980: 6th President - Roger Gaudry, Professor of History, Former rector University of Montreal,Canada

title: First Executive Committee | IAU
snippet: The IAU was the result of a process that started long before World War I to encourage cooperation between astronomers all over the world, at that time primarily led by the American astronomer George Ellery Hale.

title: Presidency — International Association of Universities
snippet: IAU President 2016-2022 Pam Fredmam and IAU President 2022-2026 Andrew Deeks

title: Leadership — International Association of Universities
snippet: It is embedded in the IAU’s mission to guide leaders of universities and other higher education institutions (HEI) worldwide: Thought leadership permeates the overall work of the Association, extending into all other IAU work.
